title: Detection of Omicron variant in November 2021: a retrospective analysis through wastewater in Halifax, Canada
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00350K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Emalie K. Hayes, Crystal Sweeney, Amina K. Stoddart, Graham A. Gagnon
This study evaluates the efficacy of wastewater surveillance and passive sampling techniques for the early detection of the SARS-CoV-2 Omicron variant in a university setting in Halifax, Canada.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
